--- In gladiator@y..., k k <scxoof187@y...> wrote:
> 
> i am new to gladiator and i am being a cleric and i and at the level 
to raise undead but when i do the shifter it says turn undead can u 
plz tell me what this does?

Turn undead kills skeletons and ghosts, regardless of experience level 
of said skeleton or ghost.  Note: you get the same amount of 
experience points for using turn undead against a level 9 skeleton or 
a level 15 skeleton.  That makes sense, of course.
